alert.note: Alert for Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 29 at 3:01AM MST until January 01 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Western Mosquito Range and East Lake County Above 11000 Feet. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft
